attributes.action: Stop the no fishing ban at Netherton Reservoir Lodge Farm
attributes.background: This site has been fished for over 40 years & is a hub for many local people & families to enjoy. The boathouse in conjunction with the local council now want to ban fishing here whilst many of the locals have helped in maintaining the area & keeping it litter free and safe. keep this a public site!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for this issue. 

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
